subject: Fashion
title: Kerby Jean-Raymond's Activism
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Kerby Jean-Raymond's Activism.

hook.text: Kerby Jean-Raymond turned a fashion show into a film about police brutality. The audience wept.

buildup.text: His brand Pyer Moss doesn't just make clothes. It makes arguments about race, history, and identity.

twist.text: Critics asked if his work was 'too political.' He asked why fashion pretending to be neutral wasn't.

punchline.text: His runway is a stage, and the story is always justice.
